name: Sweet Breakout
description:
You probably already played "Breakout" or "Arcanoid" style games where you control the board and your task is to clear all the blocks on the level. But you also probably played this games long time ago.

Sweet Breakout is a new variation of an old genre. Here you:

  • Can launch as many balls as you want but each will cost you 50 sugar - the game's currency
  • Unlike other games you don't get anything when breaking the block. You earn sugar by collecting block remainder particles
  • You can play levels in any order. First few levels are free but you have to spend some sugar to buy the others

Your progress is saved to your SUGAR account so don't worry: you don't have to unlock levels several times.

Press "Escape" during playing to return to the level selection menu. You will lose your current ball though.
